it: parses simple mustaches with data paths
parses mustaches with - in a path
parses mustaches with escaped [] in a path
parses mustaches with undefined and null paths
parses mustaches with undefined and null paths
parses mustaches with undefined and null parameters
parses contents followed by a mustache
parses a partial with context and hash
parses a partial with a complex name

expected:
BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  PROGRAM:
    CONTENT[ ' bar ' ]
  {{^}}
    CONTENT[ ' baz ' ]

BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  PROGRAM:
    CONTENT[ ' bar ' ]
  {{^}}
    CONTENT[ ' baz ' ]

BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  PROGRAM:
    CONTENT[ ' bar ' ]
  {{^}}
    BLOCK:
      PATH:if [PATH:bar]
      PROGRAM:
      {{^}}
        CONTENT[ ' baz ' ]

it: parses empty blocks with empty inverse section
parses empty blocks with empty inverse (else-style) section
parses non-empty blocks with empty inverse section
parses non-empty blocks with empty inverse (else-style) section
parses empty blocks with non-empty inverse section
parses empty blocks with non-empty inverse (else-style) section

expected:
BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  PROGRAM:
    BLOCK PARAMS: [ bar baz ]
    CONTENT[ 'content' ]

it: parses inverse block with block params
expected:
BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  {{^}}
    BLOCK PARAMS: [ bar baz ]
    CONTENT[ 'content' ]

it: parses chained inverse block with block params
expected:
BLOCK:
  PATH:foo []
  PROGRAM:
  {{^}}
    BLOCK:
      PATH:foo []
      PROGRAM:
        BLOCK PARAMS: [ bar baz ]
        CONTENT[ 'content' ]
